English:
I'm gonna go have a look around Kowloon.
Help me out.
Chinese:
接下來我要巡邏Kowloon，
你也來幫忙。
German:
Ich werde mich in Kowloon umsehen.
Hilf mir.

English:
Just shut it and come along! Besides, there's
something I wanna talk to you about.
Chinese:
總之你給我乖乖跟上，
我有話要說。
Korean:
됐으니까 잠자코 따라오소
당신에게는 해두고 싶은 이야기도 있으니
German:
Klappe zu und mitkommen!
Ich will außerdem was mit dir besprechen.
